The dimensions of this part are: length = 0.6563, width = 0.6563, height = 0.15. **Final assembly: Twisted Ring** Assemble the parts created above by placing the cylindrical cutout (part 2) on top of the cylindrical object (part 1) with a slight twist to form a ring. The final shape will be a twisted band with an inner diameter equal to the size of the cutout. The dimensions of the final shape are: length = width (equal to the inner diameter of the twisted band), height (equal to the height of part 1 plus the height of part 2).</description>
